Back to Index

Bicycle

The Bicycle node holds the bicycle preferences and some other basic information.

Manufacturer

The name of the manufacturer.

Model

The model of the bicycle (or custom tag).

Size

The size of the bicycle.

Note

User specified note to associate with the bicycle.

Display

Controls whether the rider and complete bicycle, the bicycle, or only the frame is displayed.

Visible

Toggles the display of the bicycle on or off.

RiderColor

The color fo the rider.

FrameColor

The color of the frame.

ComponentColor

The color of the components.
